display.title: Like, Zoinks
description: A &&3Sandwich Table&&r allows you to make &&3Sandwiches&&r that &&dcombine arbitrary foods into one&&r.

First stack the foods on the table, then &&7[&&r&&6Sneak+Right-Click&&r&&7]&&r to collect the sandwich. It can be &&dplaced back down to edit it,&&r including removing items using an &&3empty hand&&r.
A &&eToaster&&r can be used to toast various items, including &&3Sliced Bread&&r. If overused, it converts food into &&3Burnt and Charred Morsels&&r, the latter can be &&dused as fuel&&r.
Just remember, &&ddon't stick anything metal in the toaster&&r!
&&eBasins&&r can be filled with &&3Milk&&r and &&eCheese Culture&&r to slowly create a &&dCheese Wheel&&r!
&&3Lettuce and Cucumber&&r work great on sandwiches, and their seeds can be found by &&3fishing in brine&&r or &&3searching village chests&&r.
Cucumbers can be pickled in &&eJars&&r using salty water.
